channel.title: Vram on vNinja.net
channel.description: Recent content in Vram on vNinja.net

item.title: vSphere 5 and new licensing - Good or bad?
item.description: As many of you did I watched todays Cloud Infrastructure Forum and the release of vSphere 5 today. I was very excited with many of the features such as Storage Profiling, Storage DRS, VMFS 5 release, and they have blown the top off of the resource limits on VMs to create Monster VMs - just to mention a few. However, one topic I notice causing quite a stir is the new licensing that seemed to be very briefly mentioned at the end of the webinar.
